full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` KLUNG RDZONGS GTONG TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD PA DANG GTONG BA DANG RNAM DPYOD KYIS MDZES PA'I DPON MO BSTAN 'DZIN TSE DBANG RAB BSTAN KYI SKU RIM LA GTONG BA'I PHYIR, DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI SBYAR BA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE, DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
